Format.description: The format of the resource. The possible values are: css html js json svg xml

LightningComponentBundleId.description: The ID of the bundle containing the resource.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

Source.description: The contents of the definition. This is all the markup or code for the definition.
